section.p: The template captures information that SEND organizes into the body weight domain. It supports collecting the weight of a study subject at different points during a study.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:941)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:942)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:943)
A sequence number that is used to identify the subject record. [SEND: BWSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:944), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Weight Measurement CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:945)
A value to indicate the nature of the observation recording the subject's body weight. Use the code property of the CD type to capture the test code, and the original text property to capture a verbatim description of the test. [SEND: BWTESTCD, BWTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:946), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1547)
Used to indicate whether or not a measurement has been performed. [SEND: BWSTAT]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:947)
The recorded test result. Use up to three observations if needed. Use of standard or non-standard units of measure is indicated by the OID provided for the PQR -physical quantity representation - type supporting physical quantities. Character data is sent using the ED - encapsulated data - type. [SEND: BWORRES, BWORRESU, BWSTRESC, BWSTRESN, BWSTRESU]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:948)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:949)
Information about the time and or study day that the information to establish the finding was collected.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:950)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out. [SEND: BWEXCLFL]
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)

MAY contain [0..2] interpretationCode (CONF:951), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:952)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). Namely, whether it is a baseline value, and whether the result should be excluded from tabulations. [SEND: BWBLFL, BWEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:953)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:954)
Used to indicate the fasting status - time since consuption of food - for the study subject.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fasting Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:955)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:956)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:957)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:941)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:942)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] id (CONF:943)
A sequence number that is used to identify the subject record. [SEND: BWSEQ]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:944), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Body Weight Measurement CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:945)
A value to indicate the nature of the observation recording the subject's body weight. Use the code property of the CD type to capture the test code, and the original text property to capture a verbatim description of the test. [SEND: BWTESTCD, BWTEST]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] statusCode (CONF:946), where the @code SHALL be selected from (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1547)
Used to indicate whether or not a measurement has been performed. [SEND: BWSTAT]

SHOULD contain [0..3] value (CONF:947)
The recorded test result. Use up to three observations if needed. Use of standard or non-standard units of measure is indicated by the OID provided for the PQR -physical quantity representation - type supporting physical quantities. Character data is sent using the ED - encapsulated data - type. [SEND: BWORRES, BWORRESU, BWSTRESC, BWSTRESN, BWSTRESU]

MAY contain [0..2] interpretationCode (CONF:951), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Subject Data Interpretation Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:952)
Includes information used to better interpret the observation value (result). Namely, whether it is a baseline value, and whether the result should be excluded from tabulations. [SEND: BWBLFL, BWEXCLFL]

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:948)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:949)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Data Collection (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.27)
Information about the time and or study day that the information to establish the finding was collected.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:950)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Non Performance Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.56)
Information on the reason a scheduled activity was not carried out. [SEND: BWEXCLFL]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:953)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Exclusion Reason (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.38)
Information on the reason that a data item is to be excluded from tabulation.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship (CONF:954)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Fasting Status (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.39)
Used to indicate the fasting status - time since consuption of food - for the study subject.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:955)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:956)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

SHOULD contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:957)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
